rpgonline.state

Class WorldState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • rpgonline.state.WorldState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledInputReciever, ControllerListener, InputListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, GameState, BaseScaleState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorldEditor

    public class WorldState
extends BasicGameState
implements BaseScaleState
    A state for rendering worlds
    Author:
    Tomas
